document.topic_text: by Janis Creech reported 18 hours ago 10: Sprint Cup victories this season by Joe Gibbs Racing: four by Kyle Busch, and two each by Carl Edwards, Denny Hamlin and Matt Kenseth. 17: Top-10 finishes this season by Kevin Harvick — tops among all Sprint Cup drivers. 1,006: Laps led this season by Martin Truex Jr. — the most of any Sprint Cup driver. 0: Laps led this season by Jamie McMurray, Kasey Kahne, Ryan Blaney and Ricky Stenhouse Jr. Digital Edition
document.post: by Janis Creech reported 18 hours ago 10: Sprint Cup victories this season by Joe Gibbs Racing: four by Kyle Busch, and two each by Carl Edwards, Denny Hamlin and Matt Kenseth. 17: Top-10 finishes this season by Kevin Harvick — tops among all Sprint Cup drivers. 1,006: Laps led this season by Martin Truex Jr. — the most of any Sprint Cup driver. 0: Laps led this season by Jamie McMurray, Kasey Kahne, Ryan Blaney and Ricky Stenhouse Jr. Digital Edition
